title: Spirit Guard Quotes
body: After having bought this skin shortly after patch 5.1, I've noticed that most of Udyr's quotes are bugged. The only quotes that he will say (taunt, joke, voice over) are those for bear stance. Anyone else had this issue?

replies.body:
Hey there! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue, and we're currently working on a fix. :]
